page.title: 20Social Concerns
page.content: Asked what they disliked about the area 53% of our survey said _nothing! However in one area,Lobley Hill,one issue is a real source of concern _vandalism and the behaviour of some young people,an issue referred to by 37% of our respondents.A further 12% said there was not enough in the area for groups like the young and the unemployed to do. Eduction:because of declining pupil numbers two of the three secondary schools in our block are due to close withi9n three years_despite being less than 20 years old! The surviving school in Whickham will lose its sixth form and pupils will transfer to a tertiary college in central Gateshead. Finally thanks to the staff and pupils of Lobley Hill and Washingwell primary schools and St.John Fisher school.
